title: How Not To Meditate: In 59 Irritating Steps!
description: Meditation...We've all tried it and failed. But now you can fail fantastically in a predictable, 59-step process!So come along on an irritating how-to journey of self discovery and encounter extreme discomfort, breakfast tacos, and a wizard or two. (Nah...there's just one).
author: Jessica Warrick
